amendment.description: Pursuant to H. Res. 200, the amendment in the nature of a substitute recommended by the Committee on Ways and Means, printed in the bill, modified by the amendment printed in Part B of House Rept. 114-74 is adopted.
amendment.purpose: Pursuant to H. Res. 200, the amendment in the nature of a substitute recommended by the Committee on Ways and Means, printed in the bill, modified by the amendment printed in Part B of House Rept. 114-74 is adopted.
